helps.host: %s <mapname> [mode] - Starts the server with a specific map
helps.hostx: %s <map id> [mode] - Starts the server with a specific map
helps.port: %s [port] - Sets or displays the port for hosting the server
helps.say: %s <message...> - Send a message to all players
helps.name: %s [name...] - Change the displayed server name
helps.bans: %s - List all banned IPs and IDs
helps.unban: %s <ip/ID> - Completely unban a player by IP or ID
helps.admin: %s <username...> - Grants [cyan]Admin[] status to an online player
helps.unadmin: %s <username...> - Removes [cyan]Admin[] status from an online player
helps.load: %s <slot> - Load a save from a slot
helps.save: %s <slot> - Save current game state to a slot
helps.info: %s <IP/UUID/name...> - Find player info(s). Can optionally check for all names or IPs a player has had
helps.mode: %s [mode] view or fixed mode set by the current server, fixed mode set when executing HOS t or hostx commands are not allowed to specify mode,mode can be set to:pvp,attack,sandbox,survival,none

info.server_restart: The server needs to be restarted. Please wait 10 seconds to log in!
info.votetick_in_progress: votetick is in progress, please wait!
info.votetick_begin_info: Votetick started (60 second), vote by sending 1 or 0 (Yes:1, No:0)
info.mode_show: server mode is [%s],If mode is not set, you can specify a mode when executing host or hostx commands

error.cmd_load_slot_invalid: [red]Load slot doesn't exist, please check input:%s
error.cmd_is_exceuting: [red]Command %s is executing, please wait for execution to complete!
error.cmd_host_fix_mode: [red]Server is locked to the mode[%s]. If you want to play in other modes, please contact Super Administrator.
